rules_text:
Renown 2 [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn’t renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)[/i]
When Gilded Champion becomes renowned, you may search your library for an Equipment or Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
